mapper.select: select id from tb_machinecode where status=0 order by id limit 0,1
select status from tb_machinecode where machinecode=#{record}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_machinecode (id, machinecode, `status`, activetime, activedept) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machinecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activedept,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_machinecode
id,
machinecode,
`status`,
activetime,
activedept,

mapper.update:
update tb_machinecode
machinecode = #{machinecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activetime = #{activetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activedept = #{activedept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
